creator: kamelot.sk@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 30716
Proposed patch allowing to specify useSystemIn="true" attribute

When interactive user input during SSHExec execution is required, currently there is no option that allows it. Input can be taken only from file, property or directly as a string.

In attached patch is proposed the solution to this possible enhancement.

Thanks in advance.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: patch applied with svn revision 1555860 - thanks
